title: NYC Private Sector Vaccine Mandate: Pro Athletes, Performers Now Exempt – NBC New York - NBC New York
content:
1. NYC Private Sector Vaccine Mandate: Pro Athletes, Performers Now Exempt – NBC New York  NBC New York
  2. Stephen A. after NYC mayor lifted vaccine mandate: Kyrie is not a hero! | First Take  ESPN
  3. No, Toronto isn’t getting a ‘competitive advantage’ due to Canada’s vaccine mandate  Deadspin

description: An adamant Mayor Eric Adams on Thursday formally announced an executive order exempting New York City-based professional athletes and performers from the private sector COVID vaccine mandate while leaving it intact for the vast majority of employees, a highly controversial move he billed as one of economic necessity. Declaring his a “tough” decision in the best interest of New York’s…
